The N7 methylation was measured by the G*pppA-RNAm 7 G*pppA-RNA (the asterisk indicates that the following phosphate is 32 P labeled) conversion. The 2'O methylation was monitored by the m 7 G*pppA-RNAm 7 G*pppAm-RNA conversion. The reactions were digested with nuclease P1 to release different cap structures (G*pppA, m 7 G*pppA, and m 7 G*pppAm), which were separated on polyethyleneimine cellulose thin-layer chromatography plates.

The methylation activities of the mutant are indicated with the wild type set at 100%. The details of the methylation assays were described previously 1 . infection, supernatants were harvested, and viral burden was titrated by plaque assay. Error bars indicate standard deviations.
